overview: Paul Morris and Luis Lumem corral the men of Brazil Underground, bringing them together to plow and breed. These boys from Brazil are hot. Several make star turns. You will fall in love with top man Adonnis. Power bottom Petrick Garcia is featured in three different scenes getting used all over. Jottae Souza takes on twelve men at once in one of the craziest gangbangs ever. WoofPigBoy - who proudly wears the Treasure Island Media logo on his chest - is actually to blame, his love of all things Treasure Island and his desire to work with us led to the introduction between Paul and Luis to begin with.
title: Brazil Underground
